Projects.description: The ProgressMaker® generates real added value for teams and organizations - on a small and large scale. Functions, processes and data visualization are "designed for enterprise progress". In contrast to many other tools, the ProgressMaker® teams focuses on progress with state-of-the-art design (cooperation with the Fraunhofer Institute). And this is what makes the ProgressMaker® great:
